page.title: 17ATTITUDES IN CHARLTON KINGS
page.content: WE INTERVIEWED PEOPLE IN THE STREETS AND SUMMARISED THEIR MAJORITY VIEWS ON CURRENT NEWS. {ANIMALS}TESTING OF HOUSEHOLD PRODUCTS ON ANIMALS SHOULD BE BANNED.THE FOULING OF FOOTPATHS AND PUBLIC GRASS, BY DOGS,AND THE PRACTICE OF BLOOD SPORTS WERE STRONGLY OBJECTED TO. HOWEVER DOGS WERE SEEN AS SUITABLE TOWN PETS. {CRIME}THE LAW IS TOO LENIENT.LIFE IMPRISONMENT FOR MURDER SHOULD MEAN EXACTLY THAT.INTERVIEWS WERE DIVIDED OVER THE NEED TO ARM POLICE AND HOW TO DEAL WITH DRUNKEN DRIVERS.ACTS OF PHYSICAL VIOLENCE WERE SEEN AS THE MOST WORRING CRIME TODAY. {TOWN EXPANSION}THE COUNTRYSIDE IS DISAPPEARING TOO MUCH. PROPERTY DEVELOPERS,TOO MANY PEOPLE,TOWN PLANNERS,BUILDERS,FARMERS AND GOVERMENT WERE ALL BLAMED.
